settings.title: Return Policy for Wigs & Wig Related Items
settings.content:
Return Policy For Wigs And Related Items

Wigs/accessories can be returned for store credit if the item was not worn, tried on, or altered, and only if all original packaging is included. Please contact at orders@arda-wigs.com within five business days of receipt. If item has been altered or worn, is missing packaging, or return request isn't made within five days, the eligibility for return is voided. We inspect items at our offices before approving any return to make sure they meet these requirements. Please be honest with your returns. If you’ve put it on your head, do not send it back. Believe it or not, we can tell. :)

Full refunds will only be given in the event of a defective product. If a mistake was made by our shipping department we will happily ship you the correct item immediately. Return labels are provided free of charge so you can ship us back the mistaken or defective item.

ALL SALES OF CLEARANCE AND DISCONTINUED ITEMS ARE FINAL.

settings.title: The Drone Advantage: Take Back Control of Your Fields.
settings.text:
• Drones aren't just about flying—they're about solving the biggest headaches in modern farming.
  • The Perfect Employee: Stop waiting for overbooked crop dusters or unreliable help. A drone is the most dependable worker you'll ever have. It shows up every time, never calls in sick, and its application on the last acre is just as precise as the first.
  • Conquer Any Condition: Wet ground? Muddy fields? A drone is completely unfazed. While your heavy equipment waits for perfect conditions, a drone is in the air, protecting your crops and your timeline.
  • Fight Rising Costs: Labor, fuel, chemicals, equipment—everything is getting more expensive. A drone is the one investment that puts money back in your pocket. With a nearly unheard-of ROI, it's the smartest way to lessen the burden of rising costs.
  • Protect Your Yields & Soil: Say goodbye to tramline losses and crop damage from heavy tires. Drones apply product with precision, leaving your soil and your harvest untouched.

settings.title: Industry Leaders, Obsessed With Your Success.
settings.text:
Getting into drone spraying is a big step, and the partner you choose makes all the difference. At Raptor, we've been at the forefront of this industry longer than anyone. We use that experience for one single purpose: to build successful operators. We're not just here to sell you a drone; we're here to give you the clearest path to winning with it

  • Honest, Unbiased Guidance: We carry all the major brands, not just one. We’ll give you the straight scoop on each of them and help you find the perfect fit for your acreage, crops, and budget. No pressure. Ever.
  • Comprehensive Training & Support: We don't just hand you a box and say "good luck." We provide expert training to ensure you are a safe, confident, and efficient operator. When you have questions, you get access to the most experienced support team in the business—there isn't a problem we can't solve.
  • Your One-Stop-Shop for Success: From your first flight to scaling your operation, we're your single point of contact. We handle it all: flexible financing options, navigating complex FAA regulations, and ongoing maintenance. We're here to make your transition into drone spraying seamless and successful.

settings.placeholder: Get one-on-one advice and equipment recommendations based on your operation.
